scripts.dev:api: cd apps/api && poetry run uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.db:migrate: cd apps/api && poetry run alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:makemigrations: cd apps/api && poetry run alembic revision --autogenerate -m
scripts.db:downgrade: cd apps/api && poetry run alembic downgrade -1
scripts.docker:reset: docker compose -f infra/docker/docker-compose.yml down -v && docker compose -f infra/docker/docker-compose.yml up -d
